description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $1.6M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Brilun Construction. The average
  contract duration was 1.01 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $611.7K. The longest
  contract was 2.87 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $2.8M.
